secText:
Lesson:
1. Define and draw [OBJ:expsec_e777:free-body diagrams] for forces acting on a line.
2. [OBJ:actsec_ka49:Explore free-body diagrams] by correcting free-body diagrams.
3. Draw free-body diagrams for [OBJ:expsec_e778:forces not acting on a line].

In-class assessment:
1. [OBJ:qc_40078:Calculate] the force acting on an object using a free-body diagram.
